name: github-actions
description: Common GitHub Actions used across my repositories
author: alextheman

scripts.change-major: pnpm version major -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-minor: pnpm version minor -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-patch: pnpm version patch -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.format: pnpm run format-package-json && pnpm run format-actions
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint-package-json && pnpm run lint-actions
